Retrieves the field values stored in this {{tt|year_month_weekday_last}} object.

===Return value===
@1@ Returns the stored {{lc|std::chrono::year}} value.
@2@ Returns the stored {{lc|std::chrono::month}} value.
@3@ Returns the stored {{lc|std::chrono::weekday}} value.
@4@ {{c|std::chrono::weekday_last(weekday())}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
using namespace std::chrono;

int main()
{
    auto ymwdl{Tuesday[last]/November/2022};
    auto wdl = ymwdl.weekday_last();
    wdl = (wdl.weekday() + days(1))[last];
    ymwdl = {ymwdl.year() + years(1), ymwdl.month() - months(2), wdl};
    std::cout &lt;&lt; year_month_day(ymwdl) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
2023-09-27
}}
